Html: I'm an alliance character, and I'm trying to edit the filter options in Rawr to only show 3.2 Alliance loot.  Is it possible to do this?  I tried going into "Edit Item Filters" and removing the four Horde Tier 9 Trials, but that didn't seem to work.  It would just help a lot to not have the item lists be twice as long as they should be.
Currently, no. This functionality relies on faction data from Wowhead, which we hope to see soon.
